divs: Sighting DetailsI woke at 5am to go work.I am on dayshift this week. I have habit of looking out window when I wake. After alarm rang,I stood amd looked out window, I then saw lights flashing in sky above my shed. I observed a craft moving toward house with white blue rectangular lights flashing randomly.2 front,2 left 2 right and 2 rear. a space seperated each pair of rectangulat lights greater then size of each light.The lights had a grid pattern. It move slowly and silently till it moved out of sight from my window. I yelled to my wife get a camera then said forget it, too late,and grabbed my clothes and ran to kitchen and dressed, by the time I opened door and ran out to porch, I observed craft had passed neighbors house and decended, I saw top of craft which was black looking and observed a red light at rear and light on left. it then went out of sight. Made coffee and went to work
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Charleroi
There was one other sighting in Charleroi on or around February 17th 2012
